ayahs.text: {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ waSad~uwA@ Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi >aDal~a >aEoma`lahumo
wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti wa'aAmanuwA@ bimaA nuz~ila EalaY` muHam~adK wahuwa {loHaq~u min r~ab~ihimo kaf~ara Eanohumo say~i_#aAtihimo wa>aSolaHa baAlahumo
*a`lika bi>an~a {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ {t~abaEuwA@ {loba`Tila wa>an~a {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ {t~abaEuwA@ {loHaq~a min r~ab~ihimo ka*a`lika yaDoribu {ll~ahu liln~aAsi >amova`lahumo

fa<i*aA laqiytumu {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ faDaroba {lr~iqaAbi Hat~aY`^ <i*aA^ >avoxantumuwhumo fa$ud~uwA@ {lowavaAqa fa<im~aA man~F[A baEodu wa<im~aA fidaA^'F Hat~aY` taDaEa {loHarobu >awozaArahaA *a`lika walawo ya$aA^'u {ll~ahu la{ntaSara minohumo wala`kin l~iyaboluwaA@ baEoDakum bibaEoDK wa{l~a*iyna qutiluwA@ fiY sabiyli {ll~ahi falan yuDil~a >aEoma`lahumo
sayahodiyhimo wayuSoliHu baAlahumo
wayudoxiluhumu {lojan~apa Ear~afahaA lahumo
ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ <in tanSuruwA@ {ll~aha yanSurokumo wayuvab~ito >aqodaAmakumo
wa{l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ fataEosFA l~ahumo wa>aDal~a >aEoma`lahumo
*a`lika bi>an~ahumo karihuwA@ maA^ >anzala {ll~ahu fa>aHobaTa >aEoma`lahumo
>afalamo yasiyruwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi fayanZuruwA@ kayofa kaAna Ea`qibapu {l~a*iyna min qabolihimo dam~ara {ll~ahu Ealayohimo waliloka`firiyna >amova`luhaA
*a`lika bi>an~a {ll~aha mawolaY {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ wa>an~a {loka`firiyna laA mawolaY` lahumo

<in~a {ll~aha yudoxilu {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti jan~a`tK tajoriY min taHotihaA {lo>anoha`ru wa{l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ yatamat~aEuwna waya>okuluwna kamaA ta>okulu {lo>anoEa`mu wa{ln~aAru mavowFY l~ahumo
waka>ay~in m~in qaroyapK hiYa >a$ad~u quw~apF m~in qaroyatika {l~atiY^ >axorajatoka >aholakona`humo falaA naASira lahumo
>afaman kaAna EalaY` bay~inapK m~in r~ab~ihi. kaman zuy~ina lahu, suw^'u Eamalihi. wa{t~abaEuw^A@ >ahowaA^'ahum

m~avalu {lojan~api {l~atiY wuEida {lomut~aquwna fiyhaA^ >anoha`rN m~in m~aA^'K gayori 'aAsinK wa>anoha`rN m~in l~abanK l~amo yatagay~aro TaEomuhu, wa>anoha`rN m~ino xamorK l~a*~apK l~il$~a`ribiyna wa>anoha`rN m~ino EasalK m~uSaf~FY walahumo fiyhaA min kul~i {lv~amara`ti wamagofirapN m~in r~ab~ihimo kamano huwa xa`lidN fiY {ln~aAri wasuquwA@ maA^'F HamiymFA faqaT~aEa >amoEaA^'ahumo

waminohum m~an yasotamiEu <ilayoka Hat~aY`^ <i*aA xarajuwA@ mino Eindika qaAluwA@ lil~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ {loEiloma maA*aA qaAla 'aAnifFA >uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna TabaEa {ll~ahu EalaY` quluwbihimo wa{t~abaEuw^A@ >ahowaA^'ahumo
wa{l~a*iyna {hotadawoA@ zaAdahumo hudFY wa'aAtaY`humo taqowaY`humo
fahalo yanZuruwna <il~aA {ls~aAEapa >an ta>otiyahum bagotapF faqado jaA^'a >a$oraATuhaA fa>an~aY` lahumo <i*aA jaA^'atohumo *ikoraY`humo
fa{Eolamo >an~ahu, laA^ <ila`ha <il~aA {ll~ahu wa{sotagofiro li*an[bika walilomu&ominiyna wa{lomu&omina`ti wa{ll~ahu yaEolamu mutaqal~abakumo wamavowaY`kumo

wayaquwlu {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ lawolaA nuz~ilato suwrapN fa<i*aA^ >unzilato suwrapN m~uHokamapN wa*ukira fiyhaA {loqitaAlu ra>ayota {l~a*iyna fiY quluwbihim m~araDN yanZuruwna <ilayoka naZara {lomago$iY~i Ealayohi mina {lomawoti fa>awolaY` lahumo
TaAEapN waqawolN m~aEoruwfN fa<i*aA Eazama {lo>amoru falawo SadaquwA@ {ll~aha lakaAna xayorFA l~ahumo
fahalo Easayotumo <in tawal~ayotumo >an tufosiduwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi watuqaT~iEuw^A@ >aroHaAmakumo
>uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna laEanahumu {ll~ahu fa>aSam~ahumo wa>aEomaY`^ >aboSa`rahumo
>afalaA yatadab~aruwna {loquro'aAna >amo EalaY` quluwbK >aqofaAluhaA^
<in~a {l~a*iyna {rotad~uwA@ EalaY`^ >adoba`rihim m~in[ baEodi maA tabay~ana lahumu {lohudaY {l$~ayoTa`nu saw~ala lahumo wa>amolaY` lahumo
*a`lika bi>an~ahumo qaAluwA@ lil~a*iyna karihuwA@ maA naz~ala {ll~ahu sanuTiyEukumo fiY baEoDi {lo>amori wa{ll~ahu yaEolamu <isoraArahumo
fakayofa <i*aA tawaf~atohumu {lomala`^}ikapu yaDoribuwna wujuwhahumo wa>adoba`rahumo
*a`lika bi>an~ahumu {t~abaEuwA@ maA^ >asoxaTa {ll~aha wakarihuwA@ riDowa`nahu, fa>aHobaTa >aEoma`lahumo
>amo Hasiba {l~a*iyna fiY quluwbihim m~araDN >an l~an yuxorija {ll~ahu >aDoga`nahumo
walawo na$aA^'u la>arayona`kahumo falaEarafotahum bisiyma`humo walataEorifan~ahumo fiY laHoni {loqawoli wa{ll~ahu yaEolamu >aEoma`lakumo
walanaboluwan~akumo Hat~aY` naEolama {lomuja`hidiyna minkumo wa{lS~a`biriyna wanaboluwaA@ >axobaArakumo
<in~a {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ waSad~uwA@ Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi wa$aA^q~uwA@ {lr~asuwla min[ baEodi maA tabay~ana lahumu {lohudaY` lan yaDur~uwA@ {ll~aha $ayo_#FA wasayuHobiTu >aEoma`lahumo
ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ >aTiyEuwA@ {ll~aha wa>aTiyEuwA@ {lr~asuwla walaA tuboTiluw^A@ >aEoma`lakumo
<in~a {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ waSad~uwA@ Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi vum~a maAtuwA@ wahumo kuf~aArN falan yagofira {ll~ahu lahumo
falaA tahinuwA@ watadoEuw^A@ <ilaY {ls~alomi wa>antumu {lo>aEolawona wa{ll~ahu maEakumo walan yatirakumo >aEoma`lakumo
<in~amaA {loHayaw`pu {ld~unoyaA laEibN walahowN wa<in tu&ominuwA@ watat~aquwA@ yu&otikumo >ujuwrakumo walaA yaso_#alokumo >amowa`lakumo
<in yaso_#alokumuwhaA fayuHofikumo taboxaluwA@ wayuxorijo >aDoga`nakumo

ha`^>antumo ha`^&ulaA^'i tudoEawona litunfiquwA@ fiY sabiyli {ll~ahi faminkum m~an yaboxalu waman yaboxalo fa<in~amaA yaboxalu Ean n~afosihi. wa{ll~ahu {loganiY~u wa>antumu {lofuqaraA^'u wa<in tatawal~awoA@ yasotabodilo qawomFA gayorakumo vum~a laA yakuwnuw^A@ >amova`lakum
